en.title: **Front End **Development
en.text: As a front-end developer, I specialize in crafting visually appealing, highly responsive, and user-friendly web interfaces. Using modern technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks such as React.js and Next.js, I bring designs to life with seamless interactivity. My focus is on performance, accessibility, and cross-device compatibility to ensure the best user experience.

en.title: PHP Development **Nanodegree**
en.text: Completed an intensive Nanodegree program focused on PHP development, covering essential skills like backend programming, database management, and web application deployment. This course provided a solid foundation in modern PHP practices.

en.title: **Bachelor's** in Computer Science
en.text: I earned my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from Karakoram International University (KIU), specializing in software development, database management, and front-end technologies. During my studies, I worked on various projects involving JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, and cloud-based applications. My education provided me with both theoretical knowledge and practical skills, enabling me to develop scalable and efficient software solutions.

en.title: **MERN** Stack Development
en.text: I am a MERN stack developer with expertise in creating dynamic, responsive, and high-performing web applications. My skill set includes building RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express, designing NoSQL databases with MongoDB, and developing interactive UIs with React.js. I focus on writing clean, efficient code and optimizing applications for speed, security, and scalability.
